decision: THRESHOLD NOT MET - HUMAN GATE REQUIRED

editor_review.summary: All chapters pass editorial review with minor non-blocking issues

domain_review.summary: All mechanics verified consistent. Probability table corrected to match 4d6 distribution.

critical_fixes_completed: Skill bonus contradiction resolved - Chapter 6 now correctly states Skills add +1
Probability table corrected to match 4d6 cumulative distribution

cycle_2.result: Further improvements to probability tables, newcomer guides, tactical matrices

recommendation: Present to human gate: Delta threshold of 1.0 was not achievable. All dimensions improved +0.5 to +0.9. Both editor and domain reviews passed. Human should decide whether to accept at 7.6 overall or attempt Cycle 3.

options_for_human.description: Accept current improvements at 7.6 overall. All mechanics verified, no critical issues.
Attempt Cycle 3 (final cycle per max_cycles=3) to push toward 8.0 target.
Reject modifications and revert to baseline.
